sentence.text: In a cohort of Australians of European descent, consisting of 385 keratoconus cases and 396 controls, we screened 21 keratoconus candidate genes: regulation of signal transduction by p53 class mediator, transcription initiation from RNA polymerase I promoter, activation of cysteine-type endopeptidase activity involved in apoptotic process, glomerular basement membrane development, negative regulation of endodermal cell differentiation, cellular response to starvation, biological_process, neutrophil apoptotic process, IL1A, IL1B, ILRN, protein processing involved in protein targeting to mitochondrion, ubiquitin-dependent protein catabolic process, positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II, regulation of GTPase activity, double-strand break repair via homologous recombination, negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II, sodium ion transport, response to superoxide, TF and regulation of transcription, DNA-templated.

entity.text: regulation of signal transduction by p53 class mediator
transcription initiation from RNA polymerase I promoter
activation of cysteine-type endopeptidase activity involved in apoptotic process
negative regulation of endodermal cell differentiation
